alert.note: Alert for Greer; Jackson; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 11:27PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson, central Kiowa and east central Greer Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Tom Steed Reservoir, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobart, Lone Wolf, Mountain Park, Roosevelt, Warren, Tom Steed Reservoir, and Altus-Lugert Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
